Au nom de Dieu clément et miséricordieux ! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Ceux qui ont apposé leurs témoignages au bas (du document) ont témoigné qu'ils connaissent Fāṭima, vierge et adulte, fille d'Abū Bakr Ibn ʿAlī al-Rudaynī; Those who have set their signatures at the end hereof have born witness that they know Fâṭima, the adult virgin, daughter of Abû Bakr b. ʿAlî ar-Rudainî
and they testify that she is at this time an adult, freeborn virgin of Muslim faith, free from (legal) impediments to marriage, and that no marriage contract ils témoignent qu'elle était en ce moment-là une musulmane vierge, adulte, libre et exempte de tout empêchement de mariage, qu'il ne lui a été conclu aucun contrat
de mariage jusqu'à sa date (=date du contrat), que son frère germain Aḥmad dispose du pouvoir légal de la marier et que le mari désirant has been concluded with regard to her until the day of the date hereof, and that her full brother Aḥmad possesses the right of wilâya to give her in marriage, and that he who solicited
conclure le contrat de mariage avec elle, ʿAbd al-Malik Ibn Šuǧāʿ Ibn Ṭarḫān, lui est égal, et ceci le sept ǧumādā her in marriage, ʿAbd al-Malik b. Šuǧâʿ b. Ṭarḫân, is equal to her in respect of his social rank, and this (took place) on the seventh of Ǧumâdâ
II de l'an six cent quarante. II of the year six hundred and forty.
A témoigné de son contenu Nāṣir Ibn Nuṣayr Witness to its tenor is Nâṣir b. Nuṣair
b. Yûsuf? ...... the children of ʿArafa Ibn [...] de ... des enfants de ʿArafa
and it has been written for him at (his) order on its date. et l'on écrivit pour lui, sur son ordre et à sa date.
A témoigné de son contenu ʿImrān Ibn Witness to its tenor is ʿImrân b.
Ismaʿîl b. ʿArafa and it has been written for him Ismāʿīl Ibn ʿArafe et l'on écrivit pour lui
at his order on its date. sur son ordre et à sa date.
A témoigné de son contenu Yūsuf Ibn Witness to its tenor is Yûsuf b.
Burkân b. Manṣûr and it has been written for him Burkān Ibn Manṣūr et l'on écrivit pour lui
at his order on its date. sur son ordre et à sa date.
La somme de la dot est de quatre-vingt dīnārs: la partie payable immédiatement est de dix dīnārs, celle repoussée est de soixante-dix dīnārs, The whole nuptial gift (amounts to) eighty dînârs, the (part) falling due (is) ten dînârs, the balance seventy dînârs
sept dīnārs à la fin de chaque année, dès l'expiration de sa date. seven dînârs (falling due) at the end of each year reckoning from the expiration of the date hereof.
Le contrat fut conclu par le moyen du mandat de son susnommé frère à la susmentionnée date. The marriage contract was concluded under the wilâya of her (above) mentioned brother on the above mentioned date.
I was present at the conclusion of the contract J'ai assisté à la conclusion du contrat,
and ʿAbd al-ʿAzîz (?) b. ʿAbd al-Ḥayy has written (it) et ʿAbd al-ʿAzīz Ibn ʿAbd al-Ḥayy (l')a écrit
à sa date. on its date.
A assisté à cela There was present at it
